Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Arrhythmia/Ventricular Arrhythmia/Ectopic Ventricular Rhythm
Record.Description: A cardiac rhythm resulting from either an abnormal electrical focus in the ventrical. Ventricular ectopic beats (VEB) refer to a contraction of the lower heart chamber which occurs before it would be expected. Ventricular ectopic beats are also known as premature ventricular beats, premature ventricular complex (PVC), or ventricular extrasystole.
